description.value:
Fire

Aura 5

Each enemy that enters or starts its turn in the aura chooses either to take 20 fire damage or to be weakened until the start of its next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Standard

Reach 4

+35 vs AC; 3d10+9 damage plus 4d10 fire damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+35 vs AC; 3d10+9 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The ancient gold dragon makes three claw attacks

At-Will âœ¦ Fire

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When the ancient gold dragon is hit by a creature adjacent to it, at-will

+34 vs Fortitude; the target is pushed 5 squares and takes ongoing 20 fire damage (save ends).

Recharge 6

Close burst 4

Targets enemies; +32 vs Fortitude; 3d10+9 radiant damage, and the target is dazed until the end of the ancient gold dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target gains vulnerable 10 radiant (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Charm

Minor, Recharge

Close burst 8

Targets enemies; +32 vs Will; the target is pulled 5 squares and dazed (save ends).

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Fire, Radiant

Standard

Close blast 5

+32 vs Reflex; 4d8+9 fire damage, and the target is weakened (save ends). Miss: Half damage.

Encounter âœ¦ Fire

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and the ancient gold dragon uses it

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +32 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the ancient gold dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will âœ¦ Fire, Zone

Standard

Area burst 1 within 20

+32 vs Reflex; 4d8+13 damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends). Effect: The burst creates a zone of fire that lasts until the end of the ancient gold dragon's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn within the zone takes 20 fire damage. Sustain Minor: The zone persists.
